title: Tammy Peterson discusses Creativity, Growth and Suffering via the lens of the Artistic Process
description:
In this conversation Tammy talks about her love of art and her process of creativity. Along the way, we discuss the role of suffering and anomaly in our lives and how they contribute to who we become. She is a woman of faith, humility and gratitude. I thoroughly enjoyed this opportunity to have an in-depth conversation about many topics with her.

When Tammy talked of ballroom dancing with Jordan in her smokey blue dress, I promised her I would find this song for her, The Blue Skirt Waltz, and this link was the only reasonable approximation I could find of the song, but none of the available YouTubes capture the beauty of it the way I heard it being sung to me when I was a young woman.
https://youtu.be/5M2GnCLgp0g

Here is the clip I played of Tammy speaking of seeing and creativity, that art only becomes art when it is communicated. Start at 44:45 
https://youtu.be/e55euGSi7uE?t=2683

Tammy’s backstory with daughter, Mikhaila: https://youtu.be/Nxld1sksOZI

Jordan Peterson‘s main channel so that you can go there and subscribe:
https://youtube.com/c/JordanPetersonVideos

You can donate to Dr. Peterson here:
https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/donate/

Karen discussing the elements and principles of creativity: 
https://youtu.be/tSjKtEQnops

https://karenwongart.com
https://TheMeaningCode.com
The Meaning Code Youtube videos to see previous conversations.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_r6WlBwDSJrP43Mz07GQ/videos
